inclusion.criterion: having diarrhea for 14 days or more (up to 29 days)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Children able to take oral feeds at the time of randomization
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Growth of Shigella, Salmonella or Cholera in rectal swab culture
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children having WLZ/WHZ < -5 SD or +++ edema
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been experiencing dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, with a history of international travel and living in a camp in Sudan for a month. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
